SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
Declare @periodo int set @periodo = (select MAX(id_periodo) from dbo.AUX_PERIODO_MES_BORRA)
/* Actualiza Clase Producto en AUX_DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION. */ UPDATE AUX_DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION SET id_clase_producto = P.id_clase_producto FROM AUX_DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION A JOIN D_PLANES PL on A.id_producto = PL.id_producto and A.id_plan_producto = PL.id_plan_producto JOIN D_PRODUCTOS P on A.id_producto = P.id_producto
/* Actualiza Id_Periodo en AUX_DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION. */ UPDATE AUX_DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION set id_periodo = SUBSTRING(fecha_recepcion,1,6)
/* Borra los registros que no corresponden al periodo a procesar. Esto sucede ya que la busqueda del DataFlow es entre las fechas al primero de cada mes, entonces lo recepcionado al primer dia del mes siguiente no nos sirve y hay que borrar. */ DELETE FROM AUX_DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION where id_periodo not in (@periodo)
/* AMBULATORIO */ update H_ORD_AMB_DET set cant_items = 0, id_ingreso_prestacion = 0 where id_periodo = @periodo
update H_ORD_AMB_DET set id_ingreso_prestacion = case when (DM.id_ingreso_prestacion_char = 'A' and DM.id_tipo_orden not in (4,20,57)) then 1 --ARCHIVO when (DM.id_ingreso_prestacion_char = 'A' and DM.id_tipo_orden in (4,20,57)) then 2 --ARCHIVO ONLINE when (DM.id_ingreso_prestacion_char = 'M' and DM.id_tipo_orden not in (4,20,57,54,58)) then 3 --MANUAL when (DM.id_ingreso_prestacion_char = 'M' and DM.id_tipo_orden in (20,57,54,58)) then 4 --MANUAL ONLINE FORMULARIO 20 y 57 when (DM.id_ingreso_prestacion_char = 'M' and DM.id_tipo_orden in (4)) then 7 --MANUAL ONLINE FORMULARIO 4 when (DM.id_ingreso_prestacion_char in ('','O') and DM.origen_marca_ingreso_prestacion = 'T') then 5 --PRELIQUIDACION TRADITUM when (DM.id_ingreso_prestacion_char in ('','O') and DM.origen_marca_ingreso_prestacion = 'W') then 6 --PRELIQUIDACION WEB SERVICE when (DM.id_ingreso_prestacion_char in ('','O') and DM.origen_marca_ingreso_prestacion = 'C') then 8 --PRELIQUIDACION CONEXIA else 9 end --SIN DATO from H_ORD_AMB_DET H join AUX_DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION DM on (H.nro_cursograma = DM.nro_cursograma and H.Nro_Lote = DM.nro_lote and H.nro_secuencia = DM.nro_secuencia) JOIN DW_SALUD.dbo.D_PRODUCTOS_ORIGINAL PO on PO.id_producto_original = H.id_producto_original JOIN DW_SALUD.dbo.D_PLANES_ORIGINAL PL on PL.id_producto_original = H.id_producto_original and PL.id_plan_producto_original = H.id_plan_producto_original WHERE id_clase_producto_original in ('S' )and H.id_reintegro in ('F','R') and id_marca_valorizacion in ('P') and id_segmento_original <> 3 and SUBSTRING(H.id_prestacion,1,2) not in ('NC') and DM.id_estado_cursograma not in ('A') and H.ccosto2 = 1 and H.id_periodo in (@Periodo)
update H_ORD_AMB_DET set cant_items = 1 where id_ingreso_prestacion not in (9) and id_periodo = @periodo
/* INTERNACIONES */ update H_ORD_INT_DET set cant_items = 0, id_ingreso_prestacion = 0 where id_periodo = @periodo
update H_ORD_INT_DET set id_ingreso_prestacion = case when (DM.id_ingreso_prestacion_char = 'A' and DM.id_tipo_orden not in (4,20,57)) then 1 --ARCHIVO when (DM.id_ingreso_prestacion_char = 'A' and DM.id_tipo_orden in (4,20,57)) then 2 --ARCHIVO ONLINE when (DM.id_ingreso_prestacion_char = 'M' and DM.id_tipo_orden not in (4,20,57,54,58)) then 3 --MANUAL when (DM.id_ingreso_prestacion_char = 'M' and DM.id_tipo_orden in (20,57,54,58)) then 4 --MANUAL ONLINE FORMULARIO 20 y 57 when (DM.id_ingreso_prestacion_char = 'M' and DM.id_tipo_orden in (4)) then 7 --MANUAL ONLINE FORMULARIO 4 when (DM.id_ingreso_prestacion_char in ('','O') and DM.origen_marca_ingreso_prestacion = 'T') then 5 --PRELIQUIDACION TRADITUM when (DM.id_ingreso_prestacion_char in ('','O') and DM.origen_marca_ingreso_prestacion = 'W') then 6 --PRELIQUIDACION WEB SERVICE when (DM.id_ingreso_prestacion_char in ('','O') and DM.origen_marca_ingreso_prestacion = 'C') then 8 --PRELIQUIDACION CONEXIA else 9 end --SIN DATO from H_ORD_INT_DET H join AUX_DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION DM on (H.nro_cursograma = DM.nro_cursograma and H.Nro_Lote = DM.nro_lote and H.nro_secuencia = DM.nro_secuencia) JOIN DW_SALUD.dbo.D_PRODUCTOS_ORIGINAL PO on PO.id_producto_original = H.id_producto_original JOIN DW_SALUD.dbo.D_PLANES_ORIGINAL PL on PL.id_producto_original = H.id_producto_original and PL.id_plan_producto_original = H.id_plan_producto_original WHERE id_clase_producto_original in ('S' )and H.id_reintegro in ('F','R') and id_marca_valorizacion in ('P') and id_segmento_original <> 3 and SUBSTRING(H.id_prestacion,1,2) not in ('NC') and DM.id_estado_cursograma not in ('A') and H.ccosto2 = 1 and H.id_periodo in (@Periodo)
update H_ORD_INT_DET set cant_items = 1 where id_ingreso_prestacion not in (9) and id_periodo = @periodo
/* Actualiza marca_tablero en AUX_DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION. */
UPDATE AUX_DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION set cant_items = 0, id_ingreso_prestacion = 0
-- Internaciones UPDATE AUX_DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION set cant_items = C.cant_items, id_ingreso_prestacion = C.id_ingreso_prestacion FROM AUX_DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION P JOIN H_ORD_INT_DET C on P.nro_cursograma = C.nro_cursograma and P.nro_lote = C.nro_lote and P.nro_secuencia = C.nro_secuencia JOIN DW_SALUD.dbo.D_PRODUCTOS_ORIGINAL PO on PO.id_producto_original = C.id_producto_original JOIN DW_SALUD.dbo.D_PLANES_ORIGINAL PL on PL.id_producto_original = C.id_producto_original and PL.id_plan_producto_original = C.id_plan_producto_original WHERE P.id_clase_producto in ('S' )and C.id_reintegro in ('F','R') and id_marca_valorizacion in ('P') and P.id_producto not in (18) and SUBSTRING(C.id_prestacion,1,2) not in ('NC') and P.id_estado_cursograma not in ('A') and c.ccosto2 = 1 and C.id_periodo in (@Periodo)
-- Ambulatorio UPDATE AUX_DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION set cant_items = C.cant_items, id_ingreso_prestacion = C.id_ingreso_prestacion FROM AUX_DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION P JOIN H_ORD_AMB_DET C on P.nro_cursograma = C.nro_cursograma and P.nro_lote = C.nro_lote and P.nro_secuencia = C.nro_secuencia JOIN DW_SALUD.dbo.D_PRODUCTOS_ORIGINAL PO on PO.id_producto_original = C.id_producto_original JOIN DW_SALUD.dbo.D_PLANES_ORIGINAL PL on PL.id_producto_original = C.id_producto_original and PL.id_plan_producto_original = C.id_plan_producto_original WHERE P.id_clase_producto in ('S' )and C.id_reintegro in ('F','R') and id_marca_valorizacion in ('P') and P.id_producto not in (18) and SUBSTRING(C.id_prestacion,1,2) not in ('NC') and P.id_estado_cursograma not in ('A') and c.ccosto2 = 1 and C.id_periodo in (@Periodo)
/* Actualiza DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION. */
-- Actualiza Cantidad de Cursogramas e Importe Facturado.
DELETE FROM DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION where id_periodo in (@Periodo) DELETE FROM AUX_DM_CURSOGRAMAS
-- Periodo Desde. DECLARE @Periodo_Desde Int Set @Periodo_Desde = (select dbo.Devuelve_Fecha(@Periodo))
-- Periodo Hasta DECLARE @Periodo_DATE datetime Set @Periodo_DATE = (select CAST(SUBSTRING(CAST(id_periodo as CHAR(6)),1,4)+SUBSTRING(CAST(id_periodo as CHAR(6)),5,2)+'01' as datetime) from dbo.AUX_PERIODO_MES_BORRA) DECLARE @Periodo_Hasta Int Set @Periodo_Hasta = dbo.Devuelve_Fecha((dbo.PeriodoSiguiente(@Periodo_DATE)))
-- Actualiza auxiliar. INSERT INTO AUX_DM_CURSOGRAMAS (nro_cursograma, imp_facturado) SELECT CUC_NUM as nro_cursograma, CUC_ITF as imp_facturado FROM HOST03.HOST03.DESARROLLO.CUP004 WHERE CUC_FRE >= @Periodo_Desde AND CUC_FRE < @Periodo_Hasta and CUCREI in ('') and ECA_COD in ('O')
-- Borra los cursogramas que son capitas. DELETE AUX_DM_CURSOGRAMAS FROM AUX_DM_CURSOGRAMAS P JOIN H_ORD_AMB_DET C on P.nro_cursograma = C.nro_cursograma WHERE C.id_reintegro in ('C')
DELETE AUX_DM_CURSOGRAMAS FROM AUX_DM_CURSOGRAMAS P JOIN H_ORD_INT_DET C on P.nro_cursograma = C.nro_cursograma WHERE C.id_reintegro in ('C')
INSERT INTO DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION (id_periodo, cant_cursogramas, imp_facturado, cant_item_amb, cant_item_int, cant_item_archivo, cant_item_manual, cant_item_preliquidacion) SELECT @Periodo as id_periodo, COUNT(distinct P.nro_cursograma) as cant_cursogramas, CAST(SUM(imp_facturado) as float) as Imp_Facturado, 0 as cant_item_amb, 0 as cant_item_int, 0 as cant_item_archivo, 0 as cant_item_manual, 0 as cant_item_preliquidacion FROM AUX_DM_CURSOGRAMAS P
-- Actualiza valores en la DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION. UPDATE DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION set cant_item_amb = isnull((select SUM(cant_items) from AUX_DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION where id_origen_prestacion = 'A'),0), cant_item_int = isnull((select SUM(cant_items) from AUX_DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION where id_origen_prestacion = 'I'),0), cant_item_archivo = isnull((select SUM(cant_items) from AUX_DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION where id_ingreso_prestacion in (1,2)),0), cant_item_manual = isnull((select SUM(cant_items) from AUX_DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION where id_ingreso_prestacion in (3,4,7)),0), cant_item_preliquidacion = (select IsNull(SUM(cant_items),0) from AUX_DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION where id_ingreso_prestacion in (5,6,8)) WHERE id_periodo in (@Periodo)

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource: DECLARE @PeriodoDesde VARCHAR(8), @PeriodoHasta VARCHAR(8), @OPENQUERY nvarchar(4000), @TSQL nvarchar(4000), @Servidor nvarchar(4000), @Query nvarchar(4000) SET @Servidor = 'AS400' SET @PeriodoDesde = ? SET @PeriodoHasta = ? SET @OPENQUERY = 'insert into AUX_DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION (nro_cursograma,nro_lote,nro_secuencia,fecha_recepcion,imp_facturado,id_ingreso_prestacion_char,id_origen_prestacion, id_estado_cursograma,id_tipo_orden,nro_orden,origen_marca_ingreso_prestacion,id_producto,id_plan_producto) SELECT CURSOGRAMA, LOTE, NRO_ITEM, FECHA_RECEPCION, IMP_FACTURADO, FORMA_CARGA, ORIGEN_PRESTACION, ESTADO_CURSOGRAMA, CUPTOR, CUPNOR, CUCPRL, id_producto, id_plan_producto FROM OPENQUERY('+ @Servidor + ',''' SET @TSQL = 'SELECT O.CUC_NUM AS CURSOGRAMA, O.LOT_NUM AS LOTE, O.CUP_SEC AS NRO_ITEM, T01.CUC_FRE as FECHA_RECEPCION, T01.CUC_ITF as IMP_FACTURADO, AUDI.TRNMAR AS FORMA_CARGA,O.ORI_COD AS ORIGEN_PRESTACION, T01.ECA_COD as ESTADO_CURSOGRAMA, O.CUP_TOR as CUPTOR, O.CUP_NOR as CUPNOR,T01.CUCPRL as CUCPRL, CUP_SRV as id_producto, CUP_PLA as id_plan_producto FROM DESARROLLO.CUP004 T01 JOIN DESARROLLO.CUP007 LOT ON LOT.CUC_NUM = T01.CUC_NUM AND LOT.BCP_COD = T01.BCP_COD JOIN DESARROLLO.CUP008 O ON T01.CUC_NUM = O.CUC_NUM AND LOT.LOT_NUM = O.LOT_NUM JOIN DESARROLLO.CUP009 AUDI ON O.CUC_NUM = AUDI.TRN_CUC AND O.BCP_COD = AUDI.TRN_BCP AND O.LOT_POS = AUDI.TRN_POS AND O.LOT_NUM = AUDI.TRN_LOT AND O.CUP_SEC = AUDI.TRN_SEC WHERE T01.CUC_FRE >= '+@PeriodoDesde+' and T01.CUC_FRE < '+@PeriodoHasta+' and T01.ECA_COD in (''''O'''') and T01.CUCREI IN ('''''''') and AUDI.TRN_COD=0'')' SET @Query = @OPENQUERY+@TSQL EXEC (@Query)

DECLARE @PeriodoDesde VARCHAR(8), @PeriodoHasta VARCHAR(8), @OPENQUERY nvarchar(4000), @TSQL nvarchar(4000), @Servidor nvarchar(4000), @Query nvarchar(4000) SET @Servidor = 'AS400' SET @PeriodoDesde = ? SET @PeriodoHasta = ? SET @OPENQUERY = 'insert into AUX_DM_INGRESO_PRESTACION (nro_cursograma,nro_lote,nro_secuencia,fecha_recepcion,imp_facturado,id_ingreso_prestacion_char,id_origen_prestacion, id_estado_cursograma,id_tipo_orden,nro_orden,origen_marca_ingreso_prestacion,id_producto,id_plan_producto) SELECT CURSOGRAMA, LOTE, NRO_ITEM, FECHA_RECEPCION, IMP_FACTURADO, FORMA_CARGA, ORIGEN_PRESTACION, ESTADO_CURSOGRAMA, CUPTOR, CUPNOR, CUCPRL, id_producto, id_plan_producto FROM OPENQUERY('+ @Servidor + ',''' SET @TSQL = 'SELECT O.CUC_NUM AS CURSOGRAMA, O.LOT_NUM AS LOTE, O.CUP_SEC AS NRO_ITEM, T01.CUC_FRE as FECHA_RECEPCION, T01.CUC_ITF as IMP_FACTURADO, AUDI.TRNMAR AS FORMA_CARGA, O.ORI_COD AS ORIGEN_PRESTACION, T01.ECA_COD as ESTADO_CURSOGRAMA, O.CUP_TOR as CUPTOR, O.CUP_NOR as CUPNOR, T01.CUCPRL as CUCPRL, CUP_SRV as id_producto, CUP_PLA as id_plan_producto FROM DESARROLLO.CUP004 T01 JOIN DESARROLLO.CUP007 LOT ON LOT.CUC_NUM = T01.CUC_NUM AND LOT.BCP_COD = T01.BCP_COD JOIN DESARROLLO.CUP008 O ON T01.CUC_NUM = O.CUC_NUM AND LOT.LOT_NUM = O.LOT_NUM JOIN DESARROLLO.CUP009 AUDI ON O.CUC_NUM = AUDI.TRN_CUC AND O.BCP_COD = AUDI.TRN_BCP AND O.LOT_POS = AUDI.TRN_POS AND O.LOT_NUM = AUDI.TRN_LOT AND O.CUP_SEC = AUDI.TRN_SEC WHERE T01.CUC_FRE >= '+@PeriodoDesde+' and T01.CUC_FRE < '+@PeriodoHasta+' and T01.ECA_COD in (''''O'''') and T01.CUCREI IN ('''''''') and AUDI.TRN_COD=1 and AUDI.TRNMAR in ('''''''',''''O'''')'')' SET @Query = @OPENQUERY+@TSQL EXEC (@Query)

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.

properties.property: SELECT O.CUC_NUM AS CURSOGRAMA, O.LOT_NUM AS LOTE, O.CUP_SEC AS NRO_ITEM, AUDI.TRNMAR AS FORMA_CARGA, AUDI.TRN_COD, O.ORI_COD AS ORIGEN_PRESTACION, T01.CUC_FRE as FECHA_RECEPCION, T01.ECA_COD as ESTADO_CURSOGRAMA, T01.CUC_ITF as IMP_FACTURADO, T01.CUCPRL as CUCPRL, O.CUP_NOR as CUPNOR, O.CUP_TOR as CUPTOR, CUP_SRV as id_producto, CUP_PLA as id_plan_producto FROM DESARROLLO.CUP004 T01 JOIN DESARROLLO.CUP007 LOT ON LOT.CUC_NUM = T01.CUC_NUM AND LOT.BCP_COD = T01.BCP_COD JOIN DESARROLLO.CUP008 O ON T01.CUC_NUM = O.CUC_NUM AND LOT.LOT_NUM = O.LOT_NUM JOIN DESARROLLO.CUP009 AUDI ON O.CUC_NUM = AUDI.TRN_CUC AND O.BCP_COD = AUDI.TRN_BCP AND O.LOT_POS = AUDI.TRN_POS AND O.LOT_NUM = AUDI.TRN_LOT AND O.CUP_SEC = AUDI.TRN_SEC WHERE T01.CUC_FRE >= ? and T01.CUC_FRE < ? and T01.ECA_COD in ('O') and T01.CUCREI IN ('') and AUDI.TRN_COD=0

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.

properties.property: SELECT O.CUC_NUM AS CURSOGRAMA, O.LOT_NUM AS LOTE, O.CUP_SEC AS NRO_ITEM, AUDI.TRNMAR AS FORMA_CARGA, AUDI.TRN_COD, O.ORI_COD AS ORIGEN_PRESTACION, T01.CUC_FRE as FECHA_RECEPCION, T01.ECA_COD as ESTADO_CURSOGRAMA, T01.CUC_ITF as IMP_FACTURADO, T01.CUCPRL as CUCPRL, O.CUP_NOR as CUPNOR, O.CUP_TOR as CUPTOR, CUP_SRV as id_producto, CUP_PLA as id_plan_producto FROM DESARROLLO.CUP004 T01 JOIN DESARROLLO.CUP007 LOT ON LOT.CUC_NUM = T01.CUC_NUM AND LOT.BCP_COD = T01.BCP_COD JOIN DESARROLLO.CUP008 O ON T01.CUC_NUM = O.CUC_NUM AND LOT.LOT_NUM = O.LOT_NUM JOIN DESARROLLO.CUP009 AUDI ON O.CUC_NUM = AUDI.TRN_CUC AND O.BCP_COD = AUDI.TRN_BCP AND O.LOT_POS = AUDI.TRN_POS AND O.LOT_NUM = AUDI.TRN_LOT AND O.CUP_SEC = AUDI.TRN_SEC WHERE T01.CUC_FRE >= ? and T01.CUC_FRE < ? and T01.ECA_COD in ('O') and T01.CUCREI IN ('') and AUDI.TRN_COD=1 and AUDI.TRNMAR in ('','O')

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource: select top 1 CAST((dbo.DevuelvePeriodo(id_fecha))as CHAR(6))+'01' as Periodo_Desde from dbo.D_FECHA F JOIN dbo.D_PERIODO P on dbo.DevuelvePeriodo(F.id_fecha) = P.id_periodo where vigente_consumo = 1 order by id_fecha desc

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource: select top 1 CAST(dbo.DevuelvePeriodo(DATEADD(month,1,id_fecha)) as CHAR(6))+'01' as Periodo_Hasta from dbo.D_FECHA F JOIN dbo.D_PERIODO P on dbo.DevuelvePeriodo(F.id_fecha) = P.id_periodo where vigente_consumo = 1 order by id_fecha desc
